thread.title: Maoist leader Modem Balakrishna among 10 Naxalites neutralised in Chhattisgarh's Gariaband | Chhattisgarh News - India TV
thread.title_full: Maoist leader Modem Balakrishna among 10 Naxalites neutralised in Chhattisgarh's Gariaband | Chhattisgarh News - India TV

author: India TV News Desk
title: Maoist leader Modem Balakrishna among 10 Naxalites neutralised in Chhattisgarh's Gariaband | Chhattisgarh News - India TV
text:
In a big achievement for the security forces, maoist leader Modem Balakrishna alias Manoj, along with nine other Naxalites, was neutralised during an encounter in the Gariaband district in Chhattisgarh, said officials on Thursday.
The count, however, is expected to rise as the encounter is still underway. Providing details about the encounter, Raipur Range Inspector General of Police Amresh Mishra said the encounter broke out in the forest under Mainpur police station limits during an anti-Naxal operation in the region.
"Personnel belonging to Special Task Force (STF), CoBRA (Commando Battalion for Resolute Action - an elite unit of CRPF) and other state police units are involved in the operation. Intermittent exchange of fire is still underway," news agency PTI quoted Mishra as saying.
